text: Hi there, I'd love to talk to you about an amazing fund called Save the Children.
Hi, How are you? yes i love charities that help children and animals.
I'm great thanks for asking! Save the children does just that, they have US and global projects to give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm.
that is good to know. I always want to make sure that the charity I am giving too is legitimate and helpful.

It's definitely legitimate, each year they publish their expenditure report and last year (2017), 86% of all expenditures went to program services, while another 9% was used for fundraising and only 5% was used for management and expenses which is a much lower amount than most charities such as Unicef
very good. I am thinking about making a 0.30 cent donation to them to help the children.
That would be awesome, they actually have an option to directly utilize this task for donation so you can choose any amount from $0 all the way up to $2
ok. yeah i am going to give 0.30 cent donation of my pay towards save the children.
Well that's awesome, I'm glad to hear that you will be making a donation. What other charities do you support?
ASPCA for animals and wounded warrior project.
Do you have animals then? I have a dog and donate to the ASPCA as well
yes, i have a small shih tzu at home. they are so cute. I give to ASPCA because I love animals.
I do too, what makes you support the wounded warrior project
it helps veterans. Most importantly people who fought to save our country.
That's great, I have many veterans in my family so
thats good. I have 100% respect for veterans that have fought for our country. Animals and children are up there too on what I care the most about.
Awesome, I donate mainly to the ASPCA and the Alzheimers association since my grandfather has Alzheimers as well
hope all is well with your grandfather.  I believe donations are God's deeds too.
As well as the disease will let him be, and I agree as well, I'm going to be matching your $0.30 cent donation to Save the Children as well to help support such a great cause!
that sounds great. It is a great cause and believe it will help children in the future.
